data.name: Keyfall
data.detailed_description:
Keyfall is a unique competitive experience for both beginner and expert level typewriters, with different single player and multiplayer game modes. Players are able to compete for place in both global and country ranking leaderboards!

The game modes include, but are not limited to:
  • Single player Write-Off - just sit back and relax in unranked typing experience;
  • Single player VS against bot - fight against different level bots (unranked);
  • Multiplayer Versus - fight against your friends;
  • Knock Out - quick match type game mode, where you fight against big amount of players and only the fastest leaves with a crown!

inb shut the fuck up i dont give a fuck about typographical mistakes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
